story.body:
It has been almost a month since we launched Coinbase Exchange. We've seen great success, but we want to know, what suggestions and feature requests do our customers have for improving the Exchange? Submit your suggestions through the link below:

https://community.coinbase.com/t/submit-exchange-feature-requests-and-suggestions-here/688?u=janah

Link to list of Coinbase employee social media accounts - https://support.coinbase.com/customer/portal/articles/1766604-is-coinbase-support-present-on-social-media-
story.title: Submit Coinbase Exchange Feature Requests and Suggestions
